name: Spooks (itch) (MadMelon999)
description:
Test the limits of low resolution by playing as a 2D character in a 3D world. This idea was inspired by Pokemon.

Also, try to find the Easter Egg and enter God Mode. You will have found it when you find the lake after getting through the forest.

Press the Question Mark For Help.

Note: HTML version is more filtered than the Desktop Windows version (Windows looks Better)
